title: Hotel-Ou No Atsui Yubisaki De Iku.
alternative_title: Hotel-Ou no Atsui Yubisaki de Iku. ; Hotel-Ou no Atsui Yubisaki de Iku. - Sekai de Ichiban, Gorgeous na Aishikata ; Passion from the Hotel King's Fervent Touch ~The world's most gorgeous way to love~ ; ホテル王の熱い指先でイク。 ; ホテル王の熱い指先でイク。〜世界で一番、ゴージャスな愛し方〜 ; 호텔왕의 뜨거운 손끝으로 간다
status: Hotel-Ou no Atsui Yubisaki de Iku. ; Hotel-Ou no Atsui Yubisaki de Iku. - Sekai de Ichiban, Gorgeous na Aishikata ; Passion from the Hotel King's Fervent Touch ~The world's most gorgeous way to love~ ; ホテル王の熱い指先でイク。 ; ホテル王の熱い指先でイク。〜世界で一番、ゴージャスな愛し方〜 ; 호텔왕의 뜨거운 손끝으로 간다
description:
Description :
        Yuri's a plain Jane who works at a Chinese restaurant in a hotel. She also happens to be infatuated with the hotel owner, Saginuma, who's known as the Hotel King. Convinced that she and Saginuma are worlds apart, she's kept her feelings at bay. That was until her grandfather introduces Saginuma as a prospective partner for marriage?! After the two are introduced, they try dating and grow fond of one another. With a nod of approval to the question "Are you ready to be wrapped in my arms?", the two's newfound adventure in love has officially begun!!
